titleStmt.title: Ignota febris Fevers mistaken in notion & practice. Shewing the frequent fatal consequents thereof. Herein traversing the dissenting new hypotheses of some late writers: and erroneous opinions, of antique authors. With remarks upon bleeding, blistering, juleps, and the Jesuits pouder, in fevers. By Everard Maynwaringe, Med. D.
titleStmt.author: Maynwaringe, Everard, 1628-1699?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Dawks, and are to be sold by D. Brown at the Black Swan without Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: With errata at the foot of K4r and an advertisement on K8v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
